verbs.description: [ARG0: Paralympic Games organizers] [V: hope] [ARG1: President Trump will tune in to future events even though he finds them “ tough to watch] . ”
Paralympic Games organizers hope President Trump [V: will] tune in to future events even though he finds them “ tough to watch . ”
Paralympic Games organizers hope [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: tune] in [ARG1: to future events] [ARGM-ADV: even though he finds them “ tough to watch] . ”
Paralympic Games organizers hope President Trump will tune in to future events even though [ARG0: he] [V: finds] [ARG1: them “ tough to watch] . ”
Paralympic Games organizers hope President Trump will tune in to future events even though he finds [ARG1: them] “ tough to [V: watch] . ”
